content:
Phone Swap Request Feature
1. Background
  • Users lack a formal way to request phone swaps.
  • New feature aims to create streamlined workflow.
2. Feature Overview
  • User story: "As a user, I want to request a phone from the available list and offer one of my current phones in exchange..."
  • Feature will be implemented as a modal pop-up on the main phone list page.
3. Implementation Details
  • Frontend: Add "Request Phone Swap" button to main phone page.
  • Modal form with fields:
    • Phone to Request: Dropdown list of available phones.
    • Phone to Exchange: Dropdown list of user's current phones.
    • Reason for Request (Optional): Text area for additional comments.
    • Actions: "Submit Request" and "Cancel" buttons.
4. Backend Logic
  • New API endpoint (POST /api/phone-swaps) to handle form submissions.
  • New table in database to store swap requests, including:
    • Requester's ID
    • Requested phone
    • Offered phone
    • Status (defaulting to 'Pending')
    • Comment
5. Action Items
  • UX Team: Create wireframe of modal and form by EOD, October 17.
  • Backend Team: Develop new API endpoint and database schema. Target completion: October 21.
  • Frontend Team: Build "Request Phone Swap" button and basic modal structure. Begin implementation once wireframes are approved.
  • Product Manager: Create formal Jira ticket with defined user story and acceptance criteria.

metadata.meeting_notes:
Phone Swap Request Feature
Date: October 14, 2025
Attendees: Product Manager, UX Designer, Lead Frontend Developer, Lead Backend Developer
Objective: Define the requirements and implementation plan fo
